item.title: Through the Keyhole - 11/13/09 - James Clarkson
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: UFO investigator and retired police officer James Clarkson talks about his investigations in the Pacific Northwest, and his friendship with June Crain. June worked at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base at the time of the Roswell crash, and spoke with
item.itunes:summary: UFO investigator and retired police officer James Clarkson talks about his investigations in the Pacific Northwest, and his friendship with June Crain. June worked at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base at the time of the Roswell crash, and spoke with witnesses who saw wreckage and bodies. Before she died, she asked Clarkson to make her story public and to fight the official secrecy surrounding the Roswell event.
item.description:
UFO investigator and retired police officer James Clarkson talks about his investigations in the Pacific Northwest, and his friendship with June Crain. June worked at Wright-Patterson Air Force Base at the time of the Roswell crash, and spoke with witnesses who saw wreckage and bodies. Before she died, she asked Clarkson to make her story public and to fight the official secrecy surrounding the Roswell event.

File Download (120:00 min / 21 MB)

item.itunes:summary: Time for our monthly kick-back, let-down-your-hair chat among friends about what’s new in the field and in our lives. item.title: Through the Keyhole - 06/05/09 - Stephen Bassett
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: 06/05/09 – Stephen Bassett, PRG Executive Director. As a result of Steve’s Million Fax on Washington project, thousands of letters, faxes and emails have been sent to the presidential transition headquarters and the White House through May
item.itunes:summary:
06/05/09 – Stephen Bassett, PRG Executive Director. As a result of Steve’s Million Fax on Washington project, thousands of letters, faxes and emails have been sent to the presidential transition headquarters and the White House through May 31. They have been noted.
Now it is time to close the deal and on June 1, PRG will begin Phase III of the Million Fax on Washington to do just that. It is the final part of a plan conceived in early 2008 at the beginning of the presidential campaign.
item.description:
06/05/09 – Stephen Bassett, PRG Executive Director. As a result of Steve’s Million Fax on Washington project, thousands of letters, faxes and emails have been sent to the presidential transition headquarters and the White House through May 31. They have been noted.

Now it is time to close the deal and on June 1, PRG will begin Phase III of the Million Fax on Washington to do just that. It is the final part of a plan conceived in early 2008 at the beginning of the presidential campaign.

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 03/27/09 - Rich Dolan & Peter Robbins
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Each month, Rich Dolan, Peter Robbins and I make a point to get together and chat about current events in the field of UFO research, any personal projects that we’re working on, and anything else that sounds interesting. Rich will give us an update
item.itunes:summary: Each month, Rich Dolan, Peter Robbins and I make a point to get together and chat about current events in the field of UFO research, any personal projects that we’re working on, and anything else that sounds interesting. Rich will give us an update on his next book, UFOs and the National Security State, Volume 2; the rest will be unscripted, unrehearsed, just three friends discussing our work. Since I missed last month’s get-together due to attending the IUFOC conference in Laughlin, I have a lot to catch up on. Come join us!
item.description:
Each month, Rich Dolan, Peter Robbins and I make a point to get together and chat about current events in the field of UFO research, any personal projects that we’re working on, and anything else that sounds interesting. Rich will give us an update on his next book, UFOs and the National Security State, Volume 2; the rest will be unscripted, unrehearsed, just three friends discussing our work. Since I missed last month’s get-together due to attending the IUFOC conference in Laughlin, I have a lot to catch up on. Come join us!

item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: For years, I’ve known Joe Montaldo as my producer at the Paranormal Radio Network. However, he’s also a prominent member of the International Community for Alien Research and the host of his own show, UFO Undercover. He’ll be speaking
item.itunes:summary: For years, I’ve known Joe Montaldo as my producer at the Paranormal Radio Network. However, he’s also a prominent member of the International Community for Alien Research and the host of his own show, UFO Undercover. He’ll be speaking at this year’s X-Conference in Gaithersburg, MD on the subject of alien abductions. Join me for my first in-depth conversation with Joe about his work in the field.
item.description:
For years, I’ve known Joe Montaldo as my producer at the Paranormal Radio Network. However, he’s also a prominent member of the International Community for Alien Research and the host of his own show, UFO Undercover. He’ll be speaking at this year’s X-Conference in Gaithersburg, MD on the subject of alien abductions. Join me for my first in-depth conversation with Joe about his work in the field.

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 03/06/09 - Steve Bassett
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: For several years now, Steve Bassett has been giving government insiders a place to relate their personal experiences and knowledge of the UFO cover up to interested citizens. It’s time again for the X-Conference, which takes place at the Hilton in
item.itunes:summary: For several years now, Steve Bassett has been giving government insiders a place to relate their personal experiences and knowledge of the UFO cover up to interested citizens. It’s time again for the X-Conference, which takes place at the Hilton in Gaithersburg, MD, just outside the nation’s capitol. Join us this week as I ask Steve about his aims and aspirations for the conference, and for a rundown on the speakers he’s invited this year. Watch for some of them to appear on Through the Keyhole over the next few weeks.
item.description:
For several years now, Steve Bassett has been giving government insiders a place to relate their personal experiences and knowledge of the UFO cover up to interested citizens. It’s time again for the X-Conference, which takes place at the Hilton in Gaithersburg, MD, just outside the nation’s capitol. Join us this week as I ask Steve about his aims and aspirations for the conference, and for a rundown on the speakers he’s invited this year. Watch for some of them to appear on Through the Keyhole over the next few weeks.

item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle:
UFOlogists Peter Robbins and Richard Dolan
Since I’ll be on my way to Laughlin NV for the International UFO Congress, Rich and Peter are going to talk with each other about current events in the world of UFOlogy. I’ll join in if I can,
item.itunes:summary:
UFOlogists Peter Robbins and Richard Dolan
Since I’ll be on my way to Laughlin NV for the International UFO Congress, Rich and Peter are going to talk with each other about current events in the world of UFOlogy. I’ll join in if I can, depending on when I actually reach Laughlin and get checked into my room at the Aquarius. See what they do when I’m not there to moderate!
We’ve also got a special guest coming on in the second hour to talk about some cool new events coming up in the spring which I’m sure you’ll want to attend; so be sure to tune in!
item.description:
UFOlogists Peter Robbins and Richard Dolan

Since I’ll be on my way to Laughlin NV for the International UFO Congress, Rich and Peter are going to talk with each other about current events in the world of UFOlogy. I’ll join in if I can, depending on when I actually reach Laughlin and get checked into my room at the Aquarius. See what they do when I’m not there to moderate!

We’ve also got a special guest coming on in the second hour to talk about some cool new events coming up in the spring which I’m sure you’ll want to attend; so be sure to tune in!

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 02/06/09 - Barbara Lamb & Rebecca Hardcastle, Ph.D.
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle:
02/06/09 – Guests Barbara Lamb, M.S., M.F.T.; and Rebecca Hardcastle, Ph.D.
FIRST HOUR – Barbara Lamb is a Psychotherapist, Hypnotherapist, Regression Therapist, Author, and Researcher on the subjects of Crop Circles and Alien Abduction.
item.itunes:summary:
02/06/09 – Guests Barbara Lamb, M.S., M.F.T.; and Rebecca Hardcastle, Ph.D.
FIRST HOUR – Barbara Lamb is a Psychotherapist, Hypnotherapist, Regression Therapist, Author, and Researcher on the subjects of Crop Circles and Alien Abduction. She has appeared on TV and radio shows across the country and has spoken at many conferences on her research into crop circles and alien abductions. Barbara’s presentation at this year’s International UFO Congress will draw from her nineteen years of hypnotically regressing nearly 620 people, and will give details of their real encounters with various kinds of beings from the cosmos. Her new book is titled, Alien Experiences.
Barbara welcomes contact from those who are looking for help in dealing with abduction experiences. You can contact her at www.alienexperiences.com or at barbara_lamb@verizon.net
SECOND HOUR – Rebecca Hardcastle, PhD is a pioneer in paranormal research and experience. She conceived Exoconsciousness to describe the extraterrestrial origins, dimensions and abilities of human consciousness. In 2005, Dr. Hardcastle taught one of the first ufology courses in the nation. She is a member of Phoenix Lights 3, an educational group advocating extraterrestrial awareness, and co-founder of ETVoteNow.org, a national initiative to establish a Department of Extraterrestrial Alliances.
Dr. Hardcastle is dedicated to peacefully bridging extraterrestrial reality with mainstream religion, science, medicine, government and education. Her presentation at the International UFO Congress will lay the groundwork for making the transition from our current reality to the next, by redefining the contact experience as a cultural norm. This in turn will unlock latent abilities such as telepathy, teleportation, and longevity. To learn more, visit her website at www.exoconsciousness.com/rebecca.php
item.description:
02/06/09 – Guests Barbara Lamb, M.S., M.F.T.; and Rebecca Hardcastle, Ph.D.

FIRST HOUR – Barbara Lamb is a Psychotherapist, Hypnotherapist, Regression Therapist, Author, and Researcher on the subjects of Crop Circles and Alien Abduction. She has appeared on TV and radio shows across the country and has spoken at many conferences on her research into crop circles and alien abductions. Barbara’s presentation at this year’s International UFO Congress will draw from her nineteen years of hypnotically regressing nearly 620 people, and will give details of their real encounters with various kinds of beings from the cosmos. Her new book is titled, Alien Experiences.

Barbara welcomes contact from those who are looking for help in dealing with abduction experiences. You can contact her at www.alienexperiences.com or at barbara_lamb@verizon.net

SECOND HOUR – Rebecca Hardcastle, PhD is a pioneer in paranormal research and experience. She conceived Exoconsciousness to describe the extraterrestrial origins, dimensions and abilities of human consciousness. In 2005, Dr. Hardcastle taught one of the first ufology courses in the nation. She is a member of Phoenix Lights 3, an educational group advocating extraterrestrial awareness, and co-founder of ETVoteNow.org, a national initiative to establish a Department of Extraterrestrial Alliances.

Dr. Hardcastle is dedicated to peacefully bridging extraterrestrial reality with mainstream religion, science, medicine, government and education. Her presentation at the International UFO Congress will lay the groundwork for making the transition from our current reality to the next, by redefining the contact experience as a cultural norm. This in turn will unlock latent abilities such as telepathy, teleportation, and longevity. To learn more, visit her website at www.exoconsciousness.com/rebecca.php

item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle:
Guest: Alan Steinfeld, Host of New Realities Television and Radio
I firmly believe that – ‘A mind stretched to new realities never returns to its original dimension.’ – Alan Steinfeld
New Realities is dedicated to exploring
item.itunes:summary:
Guest: Alan Steinfeld, Host of New Realities Television and Radio
I firmly believe that – ‘A mind stretched to new realities never returns to its original dimension.’ – Alan Steinfeld
New Realities is dedicated to exploring evolving human potentials in an evolving world. This series explores the idea of how to become more conscious beings, and presents programs that invite the viewer to look at automatic behaviors and take free reign of their body, mind and spirit so that we can hope to inhabit and create a better world and achieve a greater and more peaceful reality for the planet. It is about embracing a synthesis of rational understanding with mystical awareness.

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 01/16/09 - Stanton Friedman and Marisa Ryan
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Stanton Friedman is a nuclear physicist who’s been researching, writing and speaking about UFOs from a scientific standpoint for over thirty years. Despite his many TV, radio and public appearances, Stan Friedman has never before spoken at the UFO
item.itunes:summary:
Stanton Friedman is a nuclear physicist who’s been researching, writing and speaking about UFOs from a scientific standpoint for over thirty years. Despite his many TV, radio and public appearances, Stan Friedman has never before spoken at the UFO Congress. That’s about to change, as he’ll be discussing his latest book, Flying Saucers and Science, in Laughlin next month. www.stantonfriedman.com
Marisa Ryan is a top psychic who has helped the police solve crimes, and offers past life readings and intuitive life coaching through her Awareness Institute. She is also the first psychic ever invited to speak at the International UFO Congress. Tune in for a sneak preview of her discussion of the afterlife that she will present at the UFO Congress. www.marisaryan.com
For more information on the conference including a full list of speakers and registration information, go to www.ufocongress.com. Be sure to register by Monday, January 19 for the best rates!

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 01/09/09 - Richard Dolan & Peter Robbins
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle:
It seems appropriate to devote my first broadcast of 2009 to discuss with Richard Dolan and Peter Robbins the important events that took place during the past year, and what we can look forward to in the future.
We are living at an incredibly exciting
item.itunes:summary:
It seems appropriate to devote my first broadcast of 2009 to discuss with Richard Dolan and Peter Robbins the important events that took place during the past year, and what we can look forward to in the future.
We are living at an incredibly exciting moment in history. The past year brought us a great deal of media coverage and releases of new information concerning UFO sightings around the world. We have a new president, who is affiliated with people who have spent years working toward disclosure of information held by the government concerning UFOs. Mainstream media is beginning to treat the subject more seriously, though there’s still progress to be made.
Rich and Peter are both amazingly intelligent, well-informed, and politically savvy gentlemen, and I look forward to talking with them both about the future of UFOlogy in general as well as about their own upcoming projects.
item.description:
It seems appropriate to devote my first broadcast of 2009 to discuss with Richard Dolan and Peter Robbins the important events that took place during the past year, and what we can look forward to in the future.

We are living at an incredibly exciting moment in history. The past year brought us a great deal of media coverage and releases of new information concerning UFO sightings around the world. We have a new president, who is affiliated with people who have spent years working toward disclosure of information held by the government concerning UFOs. Mainstream media is beginning to treat the subject more seriously, though there’s still progress to be made.

Rich and Peter are both amazingly intelligent, well-informed, and politically savvy gentlemen, and I look forward to talking with them both about the future of UFOlogy in general as well as about their own upcoming projects.

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 12/12/08 - Dean Radin, PhD.
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Dean Radin, PhD, is Senior Scientist at the Institute of Noetic Sciences (IONS) and the author of several books, including Entangled Minds. His first career interest, expressed at age 4, was to be jet-propelled. Since then, he has spent the majority of
item.itunes:summary:
Dean Radin, PhD, is Senior Scientist at the Institute of Noetic Sciences (IONS) and the author of several books, including Entangled Minds. His first career interest, expressed at age 4, was to be jet-propelled. Since then, he has spent the majority of his professional career fulfilling that desire by experimentally probing the far reaches of human consciousness, principally psi phenomena.
Dean says: “My interest in psi was originally motivated out of a child’s intuitive sense that the mind is far more mysterious and powerful than we know. Through education and experience I’ve also come to appreciate that these experiences are also responsible for most of the greatest inventions, artistic and scientific achievements, creative insights, and religious epiphanies throughout history. Understanding this realm of human experience thus offers more than mere academic interest—it touches upon the very best that the human intellect and spirit have had to offer.”
item.description:
Dean Radin, PhD, is Senior Scientist at the Institute of Noetic Sciences (IONS) and the author of several books, including Entangled Minds. His first career interest, expressed at age 4, was to be jet-propelled. Since then, he has spent the majority of his professional career fulfilling that desire by experimentally probing the far reaches of human consciousness, principally psi phenomena.

Dean says: “My interest in psi was originally motivated out of a child’s intuitive sense that the mind is far more mysterious and powerful than we know. Through education and experience I’ve also come to appreciate that these experiences are also responsible for most of the greatest inventions, artistic and scientific achievements, creative insights, and religious epiphanies throughout history. Understanding this realm of human experience thus offers more than mere academic interest—it touches upon the very best that the human intellect and spirit have had to offer.”

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 12/05/08 - Ted Davis and Oliver Kemenczky
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle:
Guests Ted Davis and Oliver Kemenczky, New York Strange Phenomena Investigators (NY SPI)
Amidst the proliferation of “reality” shows concerning UFO and paranormal research, one especially stands out. NY-SPI Investigates features Ted and
item.itunes:summary:
Guests Ted Davis and Oliver Kemenczky, New York Strange Phenomena Investigators (NY SPI)
Amidst the proliferation of “reality” shows concerning UFO and paranormal research, one especially stands out. NY-SPI Investigates features Ted and Oliver and their work in UFO abduction research. The show will air on Investigation Discovery (ID) on Saturday, December 13th at 10 PM eastern.
This is a reworking of the original which many of you saw on another cable channel earlier this year (which Ted and Oliver discussed here on Through the Keyhole on February 3, 2008 – scroll down for more details). This version contains “shocking, never before aired scenes and material from the Carteret case investigation that the other network didn’t want you to see.” I know the one I saw last spring was very compelling, and I can’t wait to see the new version.
I’ll talk with Ted and Oliver about their new show and will try to get them to tell me what’s different about it from the previous version. I don’t expect them to give away everything, but I do look forward to hearing some new information about this investigation. Tune in for a sneak preview, then be sure to watch their show on the 13th!
item.description:
Guests Ted Davis and Oliver Kemenczky, New York Strange Phenomena Investigators (NY SPI)

Amidst the proliferation of “reality” shows concerning UFO and paranormal research, one especially stands out. NY-SPI Investigates features Ted and Oliver and their work in UFO abduction research. The show will air on Investigation Discovery (ID) on Saturday, December 13th at 10 PM eastern.

This is a reworking of the original which many of you saw on another cable channel earlier this year (which Ted and Oliver discussed here on Through the Keyhole on February 3, 2008 – scroll down for more details). This version contains “shocking, never before aired scenes and material from the Carteret case investigation that the other network didn’t want you to see.” I know the one I saw last spring was very compelling, and I can’t wait to see the new version.

I’ll talk with Ted and Oliver about their new show and will try to get them to tell me what’s different about it from the previous version. I don’t expect them to give away everything, but I do look forward to hearing some new information about this investigation. Tune in for a sneak preview, then be sure to watch their show on the 13th!

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 11/28/08 - Duane Tudahl
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle:
Guest: Duane Tudahl, President of Mariner Point Productions
The History Channel is well known for its many excellent programs on UFOs. Tonight I’ll talk with one of the personalities behind those fantastic productions. Over the last few years,
item.itunes:summary:
Guest: Duane Tudahl, President of Mariner Point Productions
The History Channel is well known for its many excellent programs on UFOs. Tonight I’ll talk with one of the personalities behind those fantastic productions. Over the last few years, Duane has been producing, writing and/or editing the “UFO Files” series on The History Channel. Those episodes included the original UFO Hunters, Hangar 18, Texas Roswell, When UFOs Arrive, UFO Hot Spots, Alien Encounters and many others.
Along the way, Duane teamed up with co-producer John Greenewald Jr., and has interviewed many of the best-known researchers in the UFO field, including: John Schuessler, Ted Phillips, Stanton Friedman, Scott Ramsey, Dennis Balthasar, Ken Storch, Ann Druffel, Richard Dolan, Dr. Roger Leir, Paul Stonehill, Ruben Uriarte, Rob Simone, Nick Redfern, Jim Marrs, Stephen Bassett, and many others.
Duane is now president of Mariner Point Productions and is currently in various stages of production on several shows, including a new one about UFOs.
item.description:
Guest: Duane Tudahl, President of Mariner Point Productions

The History Channel is well known for its many excellent programs on UFOs. Tonight I’ll talk with one of the personalities behind those fantastic productions. Over the last few years, Duane has been producing, writing and/or editing the “UFO Files” series on The History Channel. Those episodes included the original UFO Hunters, Hangar 18, Texas Roswell, When UFOs Arrive, UFO Hot Spots, Alien Encounters and many others.

Along the way, Duane teamed up with co-producer John Greenewald Jr., and has interviewed many of the best-known researchers in the UFO field, including: John Schuessler, Ted Phillips, Stanton Friedman, Scott Ramsey, Dennis Balthasar, Ken Storch, Ann Druffel, Richard Dolan, Dr. Roger Leir, Paul Stonehill, Ruben Uriarte, Rob Simone, Nick Redfern, Jim Marrs, Stephen Bassett, and many others.

Duane is now president of Mariner Point Productions and is currently in various stages of production on several shows, including a new one about UFOs.

item.title: Through the Keyhole - 11/21/08 - Giorgio Tsoukalos
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Special guest Giorgio Tsoukalos. Many people know the name of Erich von Daniken, author of Chariots of the Gods, Gods from Outer Space, and others. He was the pioneer proponent of the controversial Ancient Astronaut theory, postulating that fossils
item.itunes:summary:
Special guest Giorgio Tsoukalos. Many people know the name of Erich von Daniken, author of Chariots of the Gods, Gods from Outer Space, and others. He was the pioneer proponent of the controversial Ancient Astronaut theory, postulating that fossils showing evidence of technology from astonishingly early dates in Earth’s history are proof that early cultures visited from elsewhere in the universe. Giorgio has worked with von Daniken for many years and has continued to unearth material that supports this theory.
I had the pleasure of attending Giorgio’s presentation at the Culture of Contact Conference last month, and it was breathtaking. Giorgio has been called the modern Indiana Jones, and not without reason. He has actually traveled all over the world, and in his lectures he shows photographs that he has taken of all those famous archeological sites that we’ve all heard of. Tonight, we’ll discuss the Ancient Astronaut theory, Giorgio’s work in the field, and his publication, Legendary Times.
item.description:
Special guest Giorgio Tsoukalos. Many people know the name of Erich von Daniken, author of Chariots of the Gods, Gods from Outer Space, and others. He was the pioneer proponent of the controversial Ancient Astronaut theory, postulating that fossils showing evidence of technology from astonishingly early dates in Earth’s history are proof that early cultures visited from elsewhere in the universe. Giorgio has worked with von Daniken for many years and has continued to unearth material that supports this theory.

I had the pleasure of attending Giorgio’s presentation at the Culture of Contact Conference last month, and it was breathtaking. Giorgio has been called the modern Indiana Jones, and not without reason. He has actually traveled all over the world, and in his lectures he shows photographs that he has taken of all those famous archeological sites that we’ve all heard of. Tonight, we’ll discuss the Ancient Astronaut theory, Giorgio’s work in the field, and his publication, Legendary Times.

item.itunes:summary: Guest Peter Robbins and Richard Dolan – The last few weeks have flown by, and once again it’s time for my regular talk with Rich and Peter on current events in our field. The three of us just attended the Culture of Contact conference in Jersey City last weekend, so I’m sure that will come up. Join in the conversation, bring us up to speed on the news stories you’ve been following, or just listen to us kick back and chat about whatever we find interesting. This time, I’ve invited two special surprise guests to come on with us for the first half hour, so be sure to tune in early!

item.title: Through The Keyhole w/ Karyn Dolan: Guest Steve Mitchell
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: After a couple of weeks of technical problems and out-of-state travel, we have returned to explore the world of magic, mystery and myth with this look into ancient stone monuments, crop circles, and dragon lore. Steve has also brought his degree in
item.itunes:summary: After a couple of weeks of technical problems and out-of-state travel, we have returned to explore the world of magic, mystery and myth with this look into ancient stone monuments, crop circles, and dragon lore. Steve has also brought his degree in mathematics to bear on such questions as the link between quantum theory and UFOs, paranormal phenomena, and ancient wisdom. Is it possible that stone circles are linked to crop circles and UFOs? Did an early race of humans really have an understanding of the dynamics of interdimensional reality, hundreds of thousands of years ago? Steve will join us live from England to discuss these topics in what promises to be a mind-bending, and hopefully mind-expanding, experience. Be sure to tune in for this one, and join in the conversation via instant messaging by following the link at the top of this page.
item.description:
After a couple of weeks of technical problems and out-of-state travel, we have returned to explore the world of magic, mystery and myth with this look into ancient stone monuments, crop circles, and dragon lore. item.title: Through the Keyhole w/ Karyn Dolan, Guest: Elizabeth Eagan Cox
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Elizabeth Eagan Cox has penned dozens of corporate histories for some of Americas most prestigious companies, including: Ayres Hotel Group, Billabong USA, Cabo Yachts Inc., Forever 21, Matsushita Avionics and TXI Cement Mfg. Co. Elizabeth was a columnist
item.itunes:summary: Elizabeth Eagan Cox has penned dozens of corporate histories for some of Americas most prestigious companies, including: Ayres Hotel Group, Billabong USA, Cabo Yachts Inc., Forever 21, Matsushita Avionics and TXI Cement Mfg. Co. Elizabeth was a columnist for Old California Gazette and she is a former school librarian. She enjoys digging up intriguing stories about history and incorporating these facts in her writing. In A GHOST OF A CHANCE she used many elements of history to bring the story to life, including the study of late nineteenth century sleight-of-hand magic, Victorian architecture, and details regarding Californias founding Hispanic culture. Elizabeth is a member of the National Society Daughters of the American Revolution (DAR) and the worldwide Irish Clann Mac Aodhagain.
item.description:
Elizabeth Eagan Cox has penned dozens of corporate histories for some of Americas most prestigious companies, including: Ayres Hotel Group, Billabong USA, Cabo Yachts Inc., Forever 21, Matsushita Avionics and TXI Cement Mfg. item.title: Through the Keyhole w/ Karyn Dolan, Guests: Richard Dolan & Peter Robbins
item.dc:creator: Administrator
item.itunes:author: Administrator
item.itunes:keywords: Society & Culture, News & Politics, Technology, Religion & Spirituality
item.itunes:subtitle: Recently, Peter, Rich and I did an episode of Through the Keyhole together in which we all chatted about current events in the field of UFOlogy. We had such a great time, and got so much positive feedback, that we have decided to do it again once a
item.itunes:summary:
Recently, Peter, Rich and I did an episode of Through the Keyhole together in which we all chatted about current events in the field of UFOlogy. We had such a great time, and got so much positive feedback, that we have decided to do it again once a month.
All three of us have just returned from the Roswell UFO Festival, so I am sure we will be comparing notes and sharing our impressions of that event. Rich and I both presented, and Peter likes to point out that for the first time, he was actually paid NOT to speak (he was the Master of Ceremonies.)
Some controversial subjects were raised, such as the role of religious belief in preventing or stopping an alien abduction, and also the imminence (or not) of full disclosure by the government of all they have been keeping from us concerning UFOs over the past sixty years or so. There will most likely be some very lively discussion this week, so be sure to access the chat room for this one.
item.description:

Some controversial subjects were raised, such as the role of religious belief in preventing or stopping an alien abduction, and also the imminence (or not) of full disclosure by the government of all they have been keeping from us concerning UFOs over the past sixty years or so. item.itunes:subtitle: Rich and I just returned from Chicago, where we attended the second Truth If You Dare symposium, sponsored by the Illinois MUFON group and organized by Sam and Julie Maranto. (Well, I attended, Rich gave a great presentation on the potential problems of
item.itunes:summary: Rich and I just returned from Chicago, where we attended the second Truth If You Dare symposium, sponsored by the Illinois MUFON group and organized by Sam and Julie Maranto. (Well, I attended, Rich gave a great presentation on the potential problems of official UFO disclosure, and touched on the recent crop circle that expresses the value of pi to ten decimal places.) Don Schmitt gave an excellent presentation of his work on the Roswell case, and it was a great conference overall. Sam and Julie both work very hard and have a lot of great ideas on how to put together an event, and they have lots more in store for the future. I will talk with Sam about the recent symposium, and about their plans for the next one, on August 17 2008. They have got Stan Friedman and Ted Phillips coming to speak, so get your tickets now!
item.description:
Rich and I just returned from Chicago, where we attended the second Truth If You Dare symposium, sponsored by the Illinois MUFON group and organized by Sam and Julie Maranto. (Well, I attended, Rich gave a great presentation on the potential problems of official UFO disclosure, and touched on the recent crop circle that expresses the value of pi to ten decimal places.) Don Schmitt gave an excellent presentation of his work on the Roswell case, and it was a great conference overall. Sam and Julie both work very hard and have a lot of great ideas on how to put together an event, and they have lots more in store for the future. I will talk with Sam about the recent symposium, and about their plans for the next one, on August 17 2008. They have got Stan Friedman and Ted Phillips coming to speak, so get your tickets now!

File Download (99:29 min / 46 MB)

item.itunes:subtitle: Jo Anns husband, Mark, says he participated in a battle against aliens at Dulce, NM, who were abducting and breeding humans and animals for experimentation and for what can only be described as recreational torture. He is now in prison on a falsified
item.itunes:summary: Jo Anns husband, Mark, says he participated in a battle against aliens at Dulce, NM, who were abducting and breeding humans and animals for experimentation and for what can only be described as recreational torture. He is now in prison on a falsified murder charge, which his wife believes is a ploy by the government to keep him from telling what he knows about these events. His wife speaks on his behalf and also runs the organization, Earth Defense Headquarters. We will hear the whole story on Friday. Be sure to join us in the virtual auditorium so you can participate with your own questions and comments!
item.description:
Jo Anns husband, Mark, says he participated in a battle against aliens at Dulce, NM, who were abducting and breeding humans and animals for experimentation and for what can only be described as recreational torture. He is now in prison on a falsified murder charge, which his wife believes is a ploy by the government to keep him from telling what he knows about these events. His wife speaks on his behalf and also runs the organization, Earth Defense Headquarters. We will hear the whole story on Friday. Be sure to join us in the virtual auditorium so you can participate with your own questions and comments!
